alert.note: Alert for Estill; Powell (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued February 04 at 12:36AM EST until February 06 at 1:00AM EST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a Flood Advisory for the following rivers in Kentucky... Red River at Clay City affecting Powell and Estill Counties. ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM EARLY THIS MORNING TO EARLY SUNDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Red River at Clay City. * WHEN...From early this morning to early Sunday morning. * IMPACTS...At 15.0 feet, Maple Street near the Red River Ranch is impassable. Water begins inundating Pompeii Road off of Highway 15. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 12:15 AM EST Friday the stage was 13.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 14.9 feet by overnight Friday night. - Action stage is 13.0 feet. - Flood stage is 17.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: If you encounter a flooded roadway, turn around and find an alternative route. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued BY 11 AM.
